features: RECOMMENDED USE: Recommended for ages 3 ; Holds up to 50 lbs.
FOR MINNIE FANS: This fun chair desk features colorful graphics of Minnie Mouse; Ideal for homeschooling or remote learning
KID-FRIENDLY DESIGN: Desk sits low to the ground for easy access; SIZE: Assembled dimensions: 20.47"L x 22.83"W x 23.23"H
TONS OF STORAGE: Desk features pull out storage bin under the seat that provides ample space for toys, art supplies and more; Built-in cup holder is ideal for art supplies
DURABLE CONSTRUCTION: Made of engineered wood and fabric built to withstand years of use; Scratch-resistant finish protects the colorful graphics; Wipes clean easily with dry cloth
body.description: Product Description An adorable addition to your girl’s room, this Minnie Mouse Chair Desk with Storage Bin from Delta Children boasts colorful graphics of Minnie, a built-in cup holder for art supplies, plus a storage bin underneath—keeping toys or books close at hand. From the Manufacturer The Disney Minnie Mouse Desk Chair Storage Bin is the perfect place to color, play, or study. The desk chair features a Minnie Mouse theme and makes a great gift idea. This toddler desk chair comes with a pull out under seat storage bin made of fabric. This bin opens up to reveal space for art supplies, books, and more. Stationary items such as pen, pencils and crayons can be stored in the cup holder provided.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Delta Children's Products Minnie Mouse 3D Toddler Bed Delta Children 9 Bin Plastic Organizer, Disney Minnie Mouse Delta Children Deluxe Toy Box, Disney Minnie Mouse Delta Children Deluxe Book & Toy Organizer, Disney Minnie Mouse Delta Children Disney Wooden Double Sided Easel With Storage, Minnie Mouse Delta Children Figural Upholstered Kids Chair, Disney Minnie Mouse Shop Other Minnie Mouse Items by Delta Children Colorful graphics and cool 3D design adds style while attached toddler guardrails keep kids safe 9 bins in varying sizes provides storage space for toys big and small Roomy interior fits tons of toys Keep all their books and toys in this adorable storage piece Two-sided easel offers a chalkboard and whiteboard drawing surface This comfy chair resembles their favorite animated character

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, Adorable, Easy Assembly, Useful, MUST BUY!!
reviews.reviewText: This is exactly what my daughter (almost 3yrs old, 35lbs) needed for her snack/meal times. Got her this for Christmas and I know she’s going to love it since observing her recent undying love for Minnie Mouse. ❤️ The reviews scared me at first regarding the assembly but it took about 20min for me to put together and was super easy. They even included extra screws. I do wish the cup holder was a bit bigger and that the unit had a back piece for the storage compartment so the drawer doesn’t slide out through the back … but everything else is great! Quality is amazing! MUST BUY!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy, well made and incredibly cute.
reviews.reviewText: I like that the seat is wide. I was expecting it to be a lot smaller and I'm pleased that the size is perfect for a 4 year old. It allows her lots of wiggle room. The surface is smooth and can be easily wiped down. The cup holder is perfect and will hold a sippy cup and it won't tip over. We'll worth the money. I will buy from this seller again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was the easiest product I’ve ever assembled. The directions were understandable and all the parts fit together perfectly and easily. It’s a sturdy desk and the graphics are great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing kid chair!
reviews.reviewText: This chair is so essential right now, it gets used all day, everyday. Eating, crafts, art, toy play, reading, everything can be done at this desk, has under seat storage, adorable characters, sturdy design, easy to assemble, seems like it will last for years, couldn’t be happier with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My almost 2 year old loves this chair! We transitioned from a high chair to this chair and I was nervous at first about her stwyikg in the chair during meals, she lives sitting at her chair to eat meals and snacks, she also loves to color and paint with it too! It was super simple to put together, and pretty durable. She likes pulling the little toy tray out and putting her things away! It's easy to wipe down and clean!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars not as sturdy as i thought
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this for my 19 month old. The only reason i gave this 4 stars is because i had to have my husband reinforce the desk part because when my daughter would climb into the chair she uses the desk to support herself and it moves significantly. Since my husband reinforced it we have had no issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You will love this desk
reviews.reviewText: From the minute I opened the box, I knew this was a good purchase. Quality in every detail. Despite what other reviewers have said, I did not think it was hard to put together. I am an older grandmother and I did it by myself in less than 2 hours. It’s not a job to rush through with power tools. All you need is two screwdrivers. The directions are clear if you use them from the beginning and follow the steps. Everything fits together beautifully and if you have to force it, you probably aren’t using the correct part or you don’t have things aligned correctly. That makes it easy to put together correctly. It’s thoughtfully constructed, very sturdy, and the finish is beautiful and durable. I believe my grandchildren will use this desk for many years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my 2 year old daughter because I needed something for her to sit to use to eat and whatever else. The written instructions where a little confusing so I had to look it up to put it together. Besides that, it was not hard to put together and probably took half in hour. It’s great quality too, so I know it will last for a long time The only I wish is the back of it went all the way down so the drawer wouldn’t be able to come out the back. My daughter loves it, so that’s all that matters.

reviews.reviewTitle: My little Minnie Lover Adored this gift!
reviews.reviewText: This is so adorable. Very sturdy and easy to assembly. My 2 year old Granddaughter loves it! Perfect size for her. She will likely outgrow it by 5.

Excelente producto, bonitos diseños,calidad de impresión,manual entendible, tornillos extras,buen tamaño depende mucho los niños si tu hijo viene de familia alta talvez le quede justo pero de niños de estatura media les queda bien hasta de 8 años delgados .

perfetto! regalo di compleanno per mia figlia di un anno, già da subito l'ha adorata, e adesso che è un pò cresciuta la usa per colorare, ecc... magari tra un pò ci farà anche cena... cassettone sotto per liberi e quaderni molto comodo, tende a sfondarsi un pò ma io onestamente l'ho riempito d libri fino all'orlo, forse un pò troppo. comodissima e perfetta, credo che rimarrà in casa ancora per almeno altri 3-4 anni! è molto compatta e non ruba molto spazio, e la stampa c'è anche dietro, per cui anche se rimane in mezzo alla stanza è molto piacevole da vedere. montaggio semplice, resistenza molto buona, la mensolina che fa da banco ha spesso fatto da trampolino per la mia scatenata marmocchia!!

Mes enfants ont eu ce bureau a leur 2ans (minnie pour ma fille, winnie pour mon fils) et ils l'ont directement adopté ! Aucunes difficultes a sy installer, pot a crayon amovible et tiroir en tissu tres pratique, ils y rangent leurs cahiers fe dessin et leur petite trousse ! Puis ils ne se balanceront pas sur leurs chaises... Tout le monde me demande ou je les ai trouvés et me dise qu'ils sont super chouette.. C'est de la bonne qualité et je ne regrette absolument pas mon choix !

Es ist süss und sieht drollig aus.meine Tochter liebt ihre Bank.es gibt nur ein kleines manko und das ist,das man sich bzw kind nicht zu sehr auf der tischplatte abstützen sollte was beim spielen malen und toben echt schwer fällt.
